text: Deborah Jo Hunter (also known as Hunter Tylo; born July 3, 1962, in Fort Worth, Texas) is an American actress. She works mostly in television soap operas. Her first appearance was in All My Children in 1985. She was fired three years later. She played Taylor Hayes in The Bold and the Beautiful. She also acted in other television programs. ==Other websites== *Hunter Tylo Official Site *Hunter Tylo's Charity * *Hunter Tylo on the Net *Retinoblastoma International Category:Actors from Texas Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Hunter Tylo
